name: Save the Fish (Labelpastek)
description:
* Oh no. The fish is going to die... Save it! *

It's basically a "Simon says" game, do the right action in order but only if the fish ask it. Don't forget the previous actions and repeat everything correctly to save the fish.

***

***

Game only playable with mouse and keyboard.
Some issues? Do you want to play the FULL HD (deluxe) game version? Just download the standalone version!

***

Game made with love by:

Matthieu Giraud - @matthieu_giraud

Simon Giraud - @Labelpastek

Duck Reaction loves you!
